languages.text: {n}Теперь голос монстра настолько спокоен, что его невозможно не узнать.{/n} "Я, Ваша Светлость. Как видите, с прошлой нашей встречи я... переменился".
{n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."
languages.original_text: {n}Теперь голос монстра настолько спокоен, что его невозможно не узнать.{/n} "Я, Ваша Светлость. Как видите, с прошлой нашей встречи я... переменился".

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now it is impossible not to recognize it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I... changed since we last met."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now it is impossible not to recognize it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}怪物の声はとても落ち着いている。その声が誰のものなのか、はっきりと理解できてしまう。{/n}「私です、陛下。ご覧の通り…私はすっかり変わってしまいました」
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物の声はとても落ち着いている。その声が誰のものなのか、はっきりと理解できてしまう。{/n}「私です、陛下。ご覧の通り…私はすっかり変わってしまいました」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}这个怪物的声音极其平静，你一下子就辨认出了他的声音。{/n}“正是我，大人。如您所见，我们上次见面之后，我……变了很多。”
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个怪物的声音极其平静，几乎让你认不出来。{/n}“正是我，大人。如您所见，我们上次见面之后，我……变了很多。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La voz del monstruo es tan tranquila que es imposible no reconocerla.{/n} «Soy yo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como puede ver, he... cambiado desde la última vez que nos vimos».
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del monstruo es tan tranquila que es imposible no reconocerla.{/n} «Soy yo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Como puede ver, he... cambiado desde la última vez que nos vimos».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Monsters ist jetzt so ruhig, dass sie unverkennbar ist.{/n} "Ich bin es, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wie Ihr sehen könnt, habe ich mich seit unserer letzten Begegnung ... verändert."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Monsters ist so ruhig, dass sie jetzt unverkennbar ist.{/n} "Ich bin es, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wie Ihr sehen könnt, habe ich mich seit unserer letzten Begegnung ... verändert."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La voix du monstre est si calme qu'il est désormais impossible de se tromper.{/n} « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Comme vous pouvez le voir, j'ai quelque peu... changé depuis notre dernière rencontre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du monstre est si calme qu'il est désormais impossible de se tromper.{/n} « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. Comme vous pouvez le voir, j'ai... changé depuis notre dernière rencontre. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Canavarın sesi, öylesine sakin çıkıyor ki onu tanımamana imkân yok.{/n} "Evet, benim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Gördüğünüz üzere ben... Son karşılaşmamızdan bu yana biraz değiştim."
languages.original_text: {n}The monster's voice is so calm now you cannot help but recognise it.{/n} "It is I, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. As you can see, I have... changed since we last met."

traits.locale_text: {n}Canavarın sesi, şu anda öylesine sakin ki bu sesi tanımamanın imkânı yok.{/n} "Evet, benim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Gördüğünüz üzere ben... Son karşılaşmamızdan bu yana biraz değiştim."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
